column2: DCT-TVA; Braf CA; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, spleen, tumor
Primary tumor was wrapped around from left to right side of face--resembled a lion's mane of tumor
Tumor was slightly filled with blood, but the other half was solid
Skull was still in tact. Brain looked in tact and healthy.
Heart and lungs were adhesed to visible white nodes in the chest cavity
1 cryogenic tube of tumor tissue was frozen down.
